title: Most Popular News Stories
text:
House hunting hotspots of 2019 revealed: Seaside destinations dominate the top 20 most popular places to search for a home Swansea, South Wales, is the most popular place among house hunters, with Brighton, East Sussex, Margate in Kent, and Torquay, Devon, also featuring in the list. House hunting hotspots for 2019 revealed by Zoopla

PROPERTY CLINIC: What can I do to stop the condensation and black mould around my windows? If your property suffers from condensation and black mould, here is what you can do to help ensure your home is as healthy as it can be. What will stop the condensation and black mould by my windows?

The Norfolk council estate that won a top architecture award - but what's it really like to live in Norwich's 'modest masterpiece'? What makes this huddle of around 100 houses and flats in Goldsmith Street, Norwich, so special - and why might it have implications for the rest of us? The council estate that won a top award: What's it like to live in it?

It's the return of Dick and Angel! New series of Escape to the Chateau starts this weekend with the couple unveiling their latest business venture Dick Strawbridge and his wife Angel return for a new series of Escape to the Chateau on Channel 4, when they reveal their latest business ventures at their 45-room renovation project in France. Channel 4's Escape to the Chateau returns for a new series

Return to the chateau! Dick and Angel reflect on 'living the dream' and how their stunning French home has been transformed since 2015 in new TV special Dick and Angel reflect on their biggest renovation projects in three special episodes - beginning on Channel 4 this Sunday at 8pm - called Escape to the Chateau: Living the Dream. Dick and Angel in new show Escape to the Chateau: Living the Dream

Who knew they existed? Try our quiz to see if you can guess the price of mid-terrace bungalows that can cost almost £500,000 We've selected 10 mid-terrace bungalows around Britain, but can you work out the difference between the one that costs almost half a million pounds and the one that cost less than £50,000? Can you guess the price of these mid-terrace bungalows in our quiz?

The secrets to good interior design: A top designer takes us round a luxury property - and offers three tips to give your home a stylish look We spent a day with one of the world's top 100 interior designers, Alexander James Interior Design, to learn about its tricks and how they can be incorporated into your own home. Here are three interior design tips that you can apply at home
description: Check out the most popular news stories, headlines, pictures or videos from Daily Mail and Mail on Sunday
